text: Second dose of my covid 19 vaccine done. Another step closer to some normality and no more shielding. I can also have my infusion on time in May! Another fab team at Tidworth looking after everyone, Thank you. #Covid19 #vaccine #Lupus #MummyWithLupus @HibbsLupusTrust @LUPUSUK https://t.co/em2FUOoyAl
